`geoaxe` - split geospatial objects into pieces

## Install

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropenscilabs/geoaxe")
```

```{r}
library("geoaxe")
```

## SpatialPolygons

```{r}
library("rgeos")
wkt <- "POLYGON((-180 -20, -140 55, 10 0, -140 -60, -180 -20))"
poly <- readWKT(wkt)
polys <- chop(x = poly)
plot(polys)
plot(poly, add = TRUE, lwd = 6)
```
